txt.en: '[placeholder], is it? I am Afárr. Welcome to Hagbuth. Not much to look at now, but we have driven the enemy soundly from this part of the tier.\n\n'Excellent work. It seems the tales about you are true.'
Afárr is in Hagbuth, in the south-eastern Clovengap.\n\nYou should tell Afárr you defeated the Angmarim.
Angmarim can be found in south-west Clovengap.\n\nGunvald has asked for you to defeat the Angmarim who are among the Wargs in south-west Clovengap.

'I am glad to hear that you are helping Mother Amma with the Warg problem. My scouts report Angmarim among the upper tiers as well.\n\n'Do what you can to lessen their foothold among the forests of Clovengap and then report to Afárr in Hagbuth, across the river. He shall reward you for your time and efforts.'
Angmarim have been spotted skulking about the western tiers of Skarashulg, in Clovengap.
